name: Zoo Escape (MellowMoose)
description:
Escape the Zoo!
The zoo has been stealing animals from their natural habitats and putting them in exhibits! Revolt against the oppressive zookeepers to finally reclaim FREEDOM!

Choose Your Play Style!
Play as either a Monkey or a Chameleon when making your way out of the zoo complex! Each animal brings their own suite of strengths and weaknesses to help you find your way to freedom!

Will you carefully sneak your way past the guards using the Chameleons camouflage ability? Or will battle your way out poop-blazing as the Monkey!

Each animal uses their own unique route to escape from the interconnecting zoo complex, so be sure to give both a try!

Controls
Movement - Arrows
Jump - Spacebar
Special ability - Z
